thoughts.text: Based on the information gathered from the web_search command, I am interested in exploring Glacier Bay National Park. I will use the browse_website command to visit the park website and learn more about the park and its kayaking opportunities.
thoughts.reasoning: Visiting the park website will provide me with more detailed and accurate information about the park and its kayaking opportunities.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the browse_website command to visit the Glacier Bay National Park website
- Look for information on kayaking opportunities, such as location, difficulty level, and rental options
- Take notes on any interesting information found
- Use the information to plan my next steps
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to get too caught up in planning and researching and remember to actually go out and explore.
thoughts.speak: I will use the browse_website command to visit the Glacier Bay National Park website and learn more about kayaking opportunities.

args.question: What are the kayaking opportunities at Glacier Bay National Park?
